sentences.sContent: Where did you learn to cook?
Cook the sauce over a low heat for ten minutes.
sentences.sCn: 把这调味汁用低火烧十分钟。

sentences.sContent: ...Women want to be able to do it all volunteer for school parties or cook delicious meals，and so their answer to any request is often Yes...
...There is even a saying that "even a clever housewife cannot cook a meal without rice"...
...Since fewer than haft of Americans say they cook at an intermediate level and only 20% describe their cooldng skills as advanced...
...but the big food companies--which want to sell anything except the raw ingredients that go into cooking－made the home cook an endangered species...
...and we need to teach people to cook food that's good enough to share with family and friends...
...people should buy fresh food and cook it themselves...
...Even those short of time or money should be encouraged to cook for themselves and their family...
...That same firewood is used to cook dinner...
...I had to hire another cook and four waitresses...
